title: Independence National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Download the August 2016 hours (pdf)      Independence Visitor Center May 28, 2016 - September 5, 2016: Open daily 8:30am - 7pm September 6, 2016 - May 2017:  Open daily 8:30am - 6pm       Liberty Bell Center May 28, 2016 - September 5, 2016: Open daily 9am - 7pm September 6, 2016 - May 2017:  Open daily 9am - 5pm Security screening closes 5 minutes before the building closes      National Constitution Center Monday - Saturday:  9:30am - 5pm Sunday:  12noon - 5pm Fee charged      President's House Site Open daily:  7am - 10pm      Independence Square Buildings The buildings in the Independence Square security area include Independence Hall, Congress Hall, and the Great Essentials Exhibit in the West Wing.  Access to the Square is through a security entrance located at 5th and Chestnut Streets.  Security screening closes 15 minutes prior to the building closing times.  *Note:  Old City Hall and the Independence Square Museum Store are not within the security area.   Independence Hall May 28, 2016 - September 5, 2016: Open daily 9am - 7pm September 6, 2016 - May 2017:  Open daily 9am - 5pm Tickets are required March - December; no tickets are required in January - February, or after 5pm during extended summer hours    Congress Hall Open daily:  9am - 5pm April - October:  Tours every 20 minutes November, December and March:  Tours every 30 minutes January - February:  Self-guided    Great Essentials Exhibit in the West Wing Open daily:  9am - 5pm   Supreme Court chamber in Old City Hall Open daily:  9am - 5pm   Independence Square Museum Store in Old City Hall Open daily:  9am - 5pm       Portrait Gallery in the Second Bank of the United States May 28, 2016 - September 5, 2016: Open daily:  11am - 5pm September 6, 2016 - October 30, 2016: Open Wednesday - Sunday 11am - 5pm October 31, 2016 - May 2017: Open Saturday & Sunday 11am - 5pm      Franklin Court Buildings The Franklin Court complex includes the Benjamin Franklin Museum, the Franklin Court Printing Office & Bindery, the Fragments of Franklin Court Archeological Exhibit, the B. Free Franklin branch of the U.S. Post Office, and the Benjamin Franklin Museum Store.  Benjamin Franklin Museum May 28 - September 5, 2016:  Open daily 9am - 7pm September 6, 2016 - May 2017:  Open daily 9am - 5pm Fee charged   Franklin Court Printing Office & Bindery Open daily:  10am - 5pm Last printing demonstration at 4:30pm   Fragments of Franklin Court Archeological Exhibit June 11 - September 5, 2016:  Open daily 12noon - 5pm September 6, 2016 - June 2017: Closed   B. Free Franklin branch of the U.S. Post Office Open Monday - Saturday:  9am - 5pm   Benjamin Franklin Museum Store May 28 - September 5, 2016:  Open daily 9:30am - 6:30pm September 6, 2016 - May 2017:  Open daily 9am - 5pm       Carpenters' Court The buildings in Carpenters' Court include Carpenters' Hall and the New Hall Military Museum.  Carpenters' Hall March - December: Open Tuesday - Sunday  10am - 4pm January - February:  Open Wednesday - Sunday  10am - 4pm   New Hall Military Museum June 11 - September 5, 2016:  Open daily 12noon - 5pm September 6, 2016 - June 2017: Closed Open for Veterans Day, Friday, November 11, 2016 9am - 5pm       Other Park Sites  City Tavern Opens at 11:30am for dining   Free Quaker Meeting House June 12 - September 5, 2016:  Open daily 11am - 4pm September 10, 2016 - November 27, 2016: Open Saturday & Sunday 11am - 4pm   Independence Archeology Lab Weekdays by appointment only, please call 215-861-4956 Must be at least 16 years old; no more than 4 people in a group   Todd and Bishop White Houses June 25 - September 5, 2016: tours offered daily; times vary, reservations required, tickets may be obtained at the Independence Visitor Center September 6, 2016 - June 2017: Closed   Declaration House May 28 - September 5, 2016: Open daily 12noon to 5pm September 6, 2016 - June 2017: Closed   Germantown White House (Deshler-Morris House) May 28 - September 10, 2016: Open Saturdays 10am to 5pm September 11, 2016 - May 2017:  Closed except for special events The Germantown White House will be open Saturday, October 1, 2016 10am - 5pm for the Revolutionary Germantown Festival & Saturday, October 8, 2016 10am - 5pm       Nearby National Park Service Sites   Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site Open Friday - Sunday:  9am - 5pm, closed from 12noon to 1pm    Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial April - October:  Open Saturday and Sunday 12noon - 4pm November - March:  Closed   Gloria Dei (Old Swedes') National Historic Site Open Tuesday - Sunday 9am - 4pm Services on Sundays at 10am, Evensong on Tuesdays at 6:30pm
